entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard developing overnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023
